text: Christine Boisson (8 April 1956 – 21 October 2024) was a French actress. She was known for her role as Marie-Ange in the 1974 movie Emmanuelle. She also appeared as Chrsitine in Born for Hell (1976) and as Ida in Identification of a Woman (1982). Boisson died on 21 October 2024 from lung disease in Paris, France at the age of 68.Mort de l’actrice Christine Boisson qui a fait ses débuts dans Emmanuelle ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Bouches-du-Rhône
title: Christine Boisson
